DOC.brief_title: Outcomes From Home Patients Recovering From Major Gynecologic Cancer Surgery : Measuring Symptoms Health-related Quality Life
DOC.criteria: Participants must 18 year old Participants must able provide inform consent Participants must schedule undergo laparotomy presume know gynecologic cancer The assessment design validated English currently available language . Translation questionnaire language would require reestablish reliability validity measure . Therefore , participant must able communicate English complete test . Participants must able speak read English fluently Participants must access home computer , personal email account , check email least weekly selfreport Patients cognitive psychiatric deficit result inability provide meaningful informed consent , judge consent professional , and/or note medical record Patients undergoing pelvic exenterative surgery ( exception patient undergo modified pelvic exenteration context debulking ovarian uterine cancer ) .
